job_tasks.phrase: Automating deployment by building CI/CD pipelines
job_tasks.justification: CI/CD pipelines are a core component of MLOps for automating the deployment process of models.

job_tasks.phrase: Setting up the necessary cloud infrastructure by using Bicep (similar to terraform) to support AI workloads and that networking are configured optimally
job_tasks.justification: Infrastructure setup and configuration, especially for AI workloads and networking, falls under MLOps and operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Using Azure AI services to not only develop new models and solutions but also to support code automation and script generation, predictive maintenance, incident analysis, anomaly detection, and more.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions 'develop new models and solutions' and lists various AI-related tasks like predictive maintenance and anomaly detection, which are core to model development.

job_tasks.phrase: integrating them into Azure cloud solutions
job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI models into existing cloud solutions involves software development practices to ensure seamless operation.

job_tasks.phrase: spearhead internal initiatives on Generative Artificial Intelligence and develop new innovative solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on driving new initiatives and developing innovative solutions, which requires understanding business needs and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate with various data-centered teams and consultants on a daily basis in a large international and dynamic environment.
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with diverse teams implies a need to understand different business and technical perspectives to achieve common goals.

soft_skills.phrase: spearhead internal initiatives on Generative Artificial Intelligence and develop new innovative solutions.
collaborate with various data-centered teams and consultants on a daily basis
Looking to future proof your CV and experience? This is THE opportunity for you.
support code automation and script generation, predictive maintenance, incident analysis, anomaly detection, and more.

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes using Azure AI services for developing new models and solutions, directly aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile. While MLOps and cloud infrastructure are present, the core focus is on building and integrating Generative AI capabilities.
